alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Western Addison; Western Chittenden (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 1:03PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Addison and southern Chittenden Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 102 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Addison, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Middlebury, Vergennes, Ferrisburg, Charlotte, Hinesburg, St. George, Weybridge, Waltham, Bristol, Monkton Ridge, Monkton, Monkton Boro, Starksboro, New Haven, Shelburne, Ferrisburgh, Mt. Philo State Park, Huntington, Addison, and Panton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Western Addison; Western Chittenden
